adDetails: Multiple insurance protections: $2,000,000 General Liability Insurance, $750,000 Auto Insurance, $1,000,000 Workers' Comp Insurance, and $20,000 cargo insurance. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Local Moving: House moving, Apartment moving, Office moving, Piano moving, Time starts at your door and ends upon completion of your move. Work for 24/7 days Rate: $65 per hour = 2 movers + 24' box truck $85 per hour = 3 movers + 24' box truck $115 per hour = 4 movers + 24' box truck Long Distance Moving: Cover the whole America Free estimate Free: Free blanket, wrap, tape, dolly, and other moving tools Free use of wardrobe boxes No extra fee for assembly and disassembly No extra fee for packing and unpacking No extra fee for multi-stops No extra fee for stairs and long carry PLEASE CALL show contact info
